issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Update font to Metric
Update button style
Update link style
Update H styles
update body text styles
update chart styles
update nav bar 
update dash styles
update wizards
update landing pages
update detail pages
update lightboxes
update non-wizard creates
tab styling

comments.body:
hi [~kgill] I have taken this pretty far, I think about as far as I can go. There are some small things and weird quirks I couldn't figure out, and I've listed those for you here. I also removed the HP logo and all blue from the nav so at least it doesn't stand out, until we re-do.

If you'd like, you can fix the remaining issues here and then merge ahoy! I hope it helped that I did all this stuff.

Issues I am seeing as I fix things:

* how to get bar under active tab title to be same length as text
* need to ooch launch instance button up a scosh on the running instances dash tile
* chosen list hover color
* breadcrumbs: icon isn't aligned properly
* chosen: Select watermark is different on single chosen vs multi chosen
* tooltip styling
* styling browser widgets like text box, checkbox, radio button
* changed button border to outline for primary button style only as experiment, but outline didn't change width on hover
* HPE logo in footer, I linked to the file but it won't display, maybe height is wrong? IDK



landing pages:
* more actions caret to $hpe-lightgray when in disabled state
* how to style the MSB tags? I updated item list .item in eucavariables and it didn't update the tags
* bucket landing tile icon isn't aligned properly
* metrics landing: actions dropdown hides behind edge of table, grab bar to resize table area is invisible
* no items found alert-box.secondary isn't picking up styling from notifications in eucaconsole.scss



detail pages: 
* all: actions menu caret color should be $hpe-black
* image: BDM table: size TD isn't centered under it's header
* instance: labels and values need alignment adjustment (values are slightly higher than labels)
* security group rules editor needs to be changed from button group to tabs, needs alignment fixes so it looks like tags do, add needs style adjust
* load balancer rules editor needs adjusting, let's chat about specifics
* spacing issues on elb details, health checks tab  

cw charts:
* how to get legend and line colors in rebrand, they seem to be inside the SVG itself

wizards: 
* select and next buttons need something (larger container?) to avoid text wrap with bold and uppercase transform
* launch config, if started from instance, tab 2 isn't styled as active tab

ELB wizard: 
* security groups multi chosen is huge
* unvisited tab .cir has active tab .cir style

create snapshot: create from volume chosen is not same height as other fields

Yep, what's on that page would be great, that site is VERY incomplete so we have to read between the lines a lot there (and some of the styles are just...not my cup of tea as well, so I am ignoring some)
Working on nav on this branch.

General Issues:
- how to get bar under active tab title to be same length as text [FIXED]
- need to ooch launch instance button up a scosh on the running instances dash tile [FIXED]
- chosen list hover color [FIXED]
- breadcrumbs: icon isn't aligned properly [FIXED]
- chosen: Select watermark is different on single chosen vs multi chosen [FIXED]
- tooltip styling [UPDATED, Note we can't have a nib border due to Foundation limitations]
- styling browser widgets like text box, checkbox, radio button [Let's discuss]
- changed button border to outline for primary button style only as experiment, but outline didn't change width on hover [FIXED]
- HPE logo in footer, I linked to the file but it won't display, maybe height is wrong? IDK  [FIXED]
- Buttons have green background color in active state (on Chrome) [FIXED]
- Region label is blank on Eucalyptus multi-region clouds [Filed GUI-2498]
- Launch Instance button on Dashboard has (extra) bold font [FIXED]

Landing Pages:
- more actions caret to $hpe-lightgray when in disabled state [FIXED]
- More Actions button should have 2px gray, change to 4 on hover [FIXED]
- how to style the MSB tags? I updated item list .item in eucavariables and it didn't update the tags [FIXED]
- bucket landing tile icon isn't aligned properly [FIXED]
- metrics landing: actions dropdown hides behind edge of table, grab bar to resize table area is invisible [Needs separate ticket]
- no items found alert-box.secondary isn't picking up styling from notifications in eucaconsole.scss [FIXED]
- All landing page tile view actions menu drop-down items are bold [FIXED]
- Key pairs landing page split button caret is invisible [FIXED]

Detail Pages:
- all: actions menu caret color should be $hpe-black [FIXED]
- image: BDM table: size TD isn't centered under its header [FIXED]
- instance: labels and values need alignment adjustment (values are slightly higher than labels) [FIXED]
- security group rules editor needs to be changed from button group to tabs [FIXED]
- security group rules editor needs alignment fixes so it looks like tags do, and needs style adjust [FIXED]
- load balancer rules editor needs adjusting (Remove HR in table) [FIXED]
- spacing issues on elb details, health checks tab [FIXED]

CloudWatch Charts:
- how to get legend and line colors in rebrand, they seem to be inside the SVG itself [Filed GUI-2501]

Wizards:
- select and next buttons need something (larger container?) to avoid text wrap with bold and uppercase transform [FIXED]
- launch config, if started from instance, tab 2 isn't styled as active tab [FIXED]

ELB wizard:
- security groups multi chosen is huge [Filed GUI-2495]
- unvisited tab .cir has active tab .cir style [FIXED]

Create Snapshot:
- create from volume chosen is not same height as other fields [FIXED]

Other Issues [KG]:
- The "JavaScript is disabled" warning was always displaying due to a misplaced closing curly brace in login.scss [FIXED]
- Disabled line items in More Actions menu on landing pages need a distinct style [FIXED]
- Inputs on launch instance wizard and tag editor didn't have proper styles (due to missing type="text") [FIXED]
- Inputs in autoscaling tag editor didn't have proper styles (due to missing type="text") [FIXED]
- Buckets landing page tile view had items in bold (via <b> tags) [FIXED]
- Launch instance wizard, like launch config, didn't highlight step 2 when launching from image [FIXED]
- ELB Details Page Instance tab had layout issues for empty results notice [FIXED]
- Bump up active tab line on wizards [FIXED]
- Left-align "Use private addressing only" checkbox in launch instance wizard [FIXED]
- BDM editor: fix checkbox, snapshot input height, add padding below labels [FIXED]
- Add 2px outline to rounded buttons on hover [FIXED]
- We need a new loading indicator, preferably one that doesn't spin (due to bouncing issue all over the place)

PR 1870 Feedback:
* Primary disabled buttons get an outline on hover, but shouldn't (screenshot attached) [FIXED]
* security group rules editor: tabs look great but the gray line below them extends all the way across the dialog, which makes it visually indistinguishable from an HR section separator. Can it only extend as far as the tabs perhaps? (screenshot attached) [FIXED]
* security group rules editor: use my IP and open to all IPs links should stay hpe green on hover, and get an underline. they appear to darken instead. All links should stay green on hover and get an underline. I thought I had set that style universally but it appears to be different in this spot. [FIXED]

PR One for this effort is at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1858

[~jloza]: Could you review and merge to allow us to have a unified LnF for the upcoming sprint demo?
PR 1 merged, sending back to you for completion of remaining punch list items, thanks so much [~kgill]!

[~kgill], not sure if this was in the original punch list, but buttons turn all green when clicked, and they shouldn't...thanks!

Also, noticed that the region menu, when logged into euca, doesn't seem to show the region, only the arrow. Might be CSS issue?

[~jloza]: PR Two for the rebranding effort is ready for review at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1870
See my updated (lengthy) comment in the ticket to note what has been marked FIXED and what remains (i.e. probably needs a separate ticket)
I opened GUI-2503 to address the metrics landing page issues

aawesome job, [~kgill]! A few small things need fixing and then we should be good (new punchlist):

* Primary disabled buttons get an outline on hover, but shouldn't (screenshot attached)
* select buttons in image picker for launch wizards hover outline seems to be chopping off the last pixel or two on the bottom (screenshot attached)
* same problem with the "next" buttons on wizards, but there it's the top that is getting chopped (screenshot attached)
* security group rules editor: tabs look great but the gray line below them extends all the way across the dialog, which makes it visually indistinguishable from an HR section separator. Can it only extend as far as the tabs perhaps? (screenshot attached)
* security group rules editor: use my IP and open to all IPs links should stay hpe green on hover, and get an underline. they appear to darken instead. All links should stay green on hover and get an underline. I thought I had set that style universally but it appears to be different in this spot. 

I think once those are fixed we should be GTG on this ticket. Then if we see anything else as we use the console we can open individual bugs. Thanks for picking up the punch list items and finishing this ticket! Go team CSS!
UX review passed, reviewed code at the same time. PR merged and ready for QA!
